verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> which <S%H6437>looketh<s%> <S%H6921>eastward:<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> whom I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5809>Azur,<s%> and <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H205>mischief,<s%> and <S%H3289>give<s%> <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> city: <S%H5892><s%>

Which <S%H559>say,<s%> It is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7138>near;<s%> let us <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> city is the <S%H5518>caldron,<s%> and <S%H587>we<s%> be the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me, and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>Speak;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3651>Thus<s%> have ye <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> the things that <S%H4609>come<s%> into your <S%H7307>mind,<s%> every one of them.
Ye have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H2491>slain<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and ye have <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H2351>streets<s%> thereof with the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Your <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> ye have <S%H7760>laid<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it, <S%H1992>they<s%> are the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H1931>this<s%> city is the <S%H5518>caldron:<s%> but I will bring you <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of it.
Ye have <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> thereof, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers,<s%> and will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> among you.

Ye shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

This <S%H1931><s%> city shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H5518>caldron,<s%> neither shall <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof; but I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> but have <S%H6213>done<s%> after the <S%H4941>manners<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> you.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when I <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> that <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%> Then fell I <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD!<s%> wilt <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> even thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of thy <S%H1353>kindred,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3605>wholly,<s%> are they unto <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> Get you <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> unto us is <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> in <S%H4181>possession.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3588>Although<s%> I have cast them far <S%H7368>off<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H3588>although<s%> I have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H776>countries,<s%> yet will I <S%H1961>be<s%> to them as a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they shall <S%H935>come.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will even <S%H6908>gather<s%> you <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H622>assemble<s%> you out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> ye have been <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and they shall take <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> thereof and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> thereof <S%H4480>from<s%> thence.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> you; and I will <S%H5493>take<s%> the <S%H68>stony<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> out of their <S%H4480>flesh,<s%> <S%H1320><s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H3820>heart<s%> of flesh: <S%H1320><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> they may <S%H1980>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: <S%H853><s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

But as for them whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of their detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> and their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> I will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> upon their own <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Then did the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> them; and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the east <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6924><s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Afterwards the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> took me <S%H5375>up,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in a <S%H4758>vision<s%> by the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> into <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> them of the <S%H1473>captivity.<s%> So the <S%H4758>vision<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me.
Then I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H7200>showed<s%> me.
